backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining dialogue, activities, moments, letters, and per‑user game state with functions to start or continue a game.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping specific frontend files to React initialization fixes and stability requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of all major frontend game files for planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point loading the root React application.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Operational guide explaining canister uptime limits and steps to keep the backend running.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling startup, backend availability checks, navigation, and guarded game launch logic.
Defines activity data including IDs, descriptions, trust effects, and optional unlockable moments.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Manages audio settings and background music playback using a persisted Zustand store.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: 3D Puro character component with idle animation, hover effects, and dialogue-triggering interactions.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Implements touch-based joystick and look controls for mobile devices.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Handles keyboard and joystick inputs, producing normalized movement and look deltas.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Provides customization item definitions with allowed placement locations.
Contains structured dialogue tree nodes with choices, trust effects, and branching logic.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game view component that initializes the game, manages UI panels, audio, and 3D scene rendering.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Generates letter responses by matching content keywords to friendly, curious, or encouraging templates.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: A book-sorting drag-and-drop minigame where correct placements adjust trust and completion triggers rewards.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: A drawing-viewing minigame where players browse Puro's sketches, increasing trust as they view each one.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: A timed hide-and-seek minigame where players guess Puro's hiding spot and gain or lose trust based on accuracy.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Launcher component that displays a menu and loads one of several minigames based on user selection.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a narrative moment with title and scene text inside a modal-like card.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines moment data objects containing titles, descriptions, scenes, and trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Three.js library scene with player movement, camera follow, environment lighting, and interactive objects like bookshelves and Puro.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand store holding game state, UI flags, and actions for trust, dialogue, activities, letters, customization, and endings.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Defines ending data and provides a helper to select an ending based on trust thresholds.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Displays the final ending scene based on trust level and allows restarting or returning to the title screen.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Shows available activities, applies trust changes, records completion, unlocks moments, and closes after selection.
Lets players place discovered customization items in the library and view placed decorations.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Renders dialogue nodes with selectable choices that adjust trust and navigate or exit the dialogue tree.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Supports writing letters, receiving generated responses, and browsing the inbox.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Displays a list of moments, showing locked/unlocked status, and plays a selected moment via MomentPlayer.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Provides pause menu controls including resume, navigation to submenus, settings access, and progress reset.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Renders audio settings with mute toggle, volume slider, and a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Shows the user's trust level with dynamic color, label, and progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health status using the actor’s isAvailable method and exposes availability state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for game state fetching and mutations like choices, activities, customization, and progress reset.
frontend/src/index.css: Applies Tailwind base styles and defines a warm color palette with light and dark theme variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Runs one-time startup checks including storage availability and preloading assets, with reset support for testing.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays game credits and features with a themed background and a back button.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Shows a detailed launch error summary with optional technical details and retry/back actions.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: Catches runtime rendering errors in the game and displays a fallback UI with optional error details.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Renders the game's title menu with new game, continue, settings, credits, and server-status handling.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Converts raw launch errors into categorized, user-friendly summaries while preserving technical details.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation of the frontend startup module and its one‑time initialization sequence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state for a 3D library-based adventure/visual-novel hybrid, including gameplay goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature requirements. Highlights startup/canister problems, render-loop bug, and unresolved visual-style scope decisions.
